selectJobCategoryID: SELECT DISTINCT CategoryID, NameJobCategory FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? or NameJobCategory = ?
selectUserNotActivated: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.Email, ua.FullName, ua.IsMale, ua.PhoneNumber, ua.Place, ua.Image, ua.PersonID,  DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateAccount, ua.PointsAverage , jc.`CategoryID`, jc.NameJobCategory, jc.Exprience, jc.Qualifications, jc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(jc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory FROM useraccounts as ua INNER JOIN jobcategories AS jc on ua.UserAccountID = jc.UserWorkerID WHERE jc.ActiveStatus = ? AND ua.UserTypeID = ?
insertJobCategoryNotByCategoryID: INSERT INTO jobcategories( UserWorkerID, NameJobCategory, Exprience, Qualifications, GeneralInformation, ImageStore) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?)
insertJobCategoryByCategoryID: INSERT INTO jobcategories(CategoryID, UserWorkerID, NameJobCategory, Exprience, Qualifications, GeneralInformation, ImageStore) SELECT ?,?,?,?,?,?,? WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? and UserWorkerID = ?) LIMIT 1
updateActiveCV: UPDATE jobcategories SET ActiveStatus = 1, ActiveDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UserAdminActive = ? WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ?
deleteCV: DELETE FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? and UserWorkerID = ? AND ActiveStatus = 0
